keyMappings:
# Cusotm Key
unmapAll

map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map d scrollPageDown
map u scrollPageUp
map h goBack
map l goForward

map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map gi focusInput
map gf nextFrame
map gF mainFrame
map ge Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map gE Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

map r reload
map y copyCurrentUrl
map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode
map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map i Vomnibar.activate
map o Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

map ^ firstTab
map $ lastTab
map H previousTab
map L nextTab
map X restoreTab
map x removeTab
map t createTab
map P goPrevious
map N goNext
map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight
searchEngines:
# Custom search
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
n: https://www.nicovideo.jp/search/%s?ref=nicotop_search niconico
a: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
